thread.section_title: Kerry Hotel Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best Hotel in existence!
thread.title_full: Best Hotel in existence! - Review of Kerry Hotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: flipfloops
title: Best Hotel in existence!
text:
My family absolutely LOVED this hotel! The breakfast is so huge and incredible, lots of options for all types of eaters. There was really helpful staff, and the concierge was super helpful. The rooms were amazing and there are so many things to discover about the building. You can play sports, and there is even a HUGE obstacle course play room that even my 14 year old loved. I don't have anything negative to say about this hotel, if you need a place to stay, this is your best option.
Room Tip: Highest floor possible See more room tips
